name: Harmony of the bravest
description: Harmony of the bravest is a game developed by RPG Maker MV. Fight againts strong enemies, save Armonia from a millennial prophecy and discover the truth about that! Bring your friends back with always different strategies in this turn based roleplay game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit) or Mac OS X 10.10 or higher Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or equivalent or greater Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: One with OpenGL support Storage: 1 GB available space
